mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment) AS 'totalCount', u.name FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE mng_no=#{mng_no} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC, comment_id DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET #{page};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(mng_no, user_id, contents) VALUES (#{mng_no}, #{id}, #{contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET contents=#{contents} WHERE comment_id=#{comment_id}
